properties.name: HorizonColor
properties.comment: Color of the horizon after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

properties.comment: Color of the zenith after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

properties.name: CloudColor
properties.comment: Color of the clouds after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

properties.comment: Color of the clouds after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

properties.comment: Color of the clouds after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

properties.name: MoonLightColor
properties.comment: Color of the clouds after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

properties.name: MoonIntensity
properties.comment: Color of the clouds after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

properties.name: CloudOpacity
properties.comment: opacity of the clouds after blending the skysphere curve with all volumes curves

methods.name: UpdatePreview
methods.comment: Update the preview of the skyesphere in the editor

methods.name: GetColorCurveValue
methods.comment: Expose getting a value from a FRuntimeCurveLinearColor to bp

methods.name: GetFloatCurveValue
methods.comment: Expose getting a value from a FRuntimeFloatCurve to bp

methods.name: GetSkySphereSettings
methods.comment: Get the settings for the sky sphere

methods.name: SetupPreviewDelegate
methods.comment: Setup so that we get calls to UpdatePreview whenever time of day is updated in the editor

properties.name: mSunLightColorCurve
properties.comment: How the sunlight changes during the day

properties.name: mSunIntensity
properties.comment: How does the suns intensity change during the day

properties.name: mSunRotationPitch
properties.comment: Unlogical property, basically tells how the suns location in it's curve should change during the day

properties.name: mSunLightShaftOcclusionCurve
properties.comment: Changes how the lightshafts changes during the day

properties.name: mMoonLightColorCurve
properties.comment: How the moonlight changes during the NIGHT

properties.name: mMoonIntensity
properties.comment: How does the moons intensity change during the NIGHT

properties.name: mMoonRotationPitch
properties.comment: Unlogical property, basically tells how the moons location in it's curve should change during the day

properties.name: mMoonLightShaftOcclusionCurve
properties.comment: Changes how the lightshafts changes during the day

properties.name: mSkyLightIntensity
properties.comment: How does the sky light intensity change during the day

properties.name: mOcclusionTintColor
properties.comment: How does the occlusion tint intensity change during the day

properties.name: mHorizonColorCurve
properties.comment: How the color of the horizon changes during the day

properties.name: mZenithColorCurve
properties.comment: How the color of the zenith changes during the day

properties.name: mCloudColorCurve
properties.comment: How the color of clouds zenith changes during the day

properties.name: mCloudOpacity
properties.comment: How the opakeness of the clouds change during the day

properties.name: mStarBrightness
properties.comment: How does the stars brightness change during the day

properties.name: mSkyLightColor
properties.comment: How does the ambient light color change during the day

properties.name: mSunFogMultiplier
properties.comment: How does the sun multiplier change during the day in the atmospheric fog

properties.name: mPreviewTime
properties.comment: How the sunlight changes during the day

properties.name: mTimeOfDayUpdated
properties.comment: In editor, receive updates for whenever the time of day is updated

properties.name: mViewMinInput
properties.comment: For ICurvePanningInterface
